name: Egypt VR: Pyramid Tomb Adventure Game (Cardboard)
name_original: Egypt VR: Pyramid Tomb Adventure Game (Cardboard)
description:
Enter the mysterious world of the ancient pyramids and explore the historic tombs filled with mystery and Egyptian hidden objects. Interact in amazing tombs designed to the finest detail and solve puzzles to unmask the secrets of the Pharaoh.

Just some of the featured offered by Egypt VR:
◮ Unique puzzles mixed with escape the room type game-play
◮ Flexible inventory system
◮ Raid and discover multiple tombs
◮ An experience filled with mystery and riddles for your to unmask
◮ Play in touch mode (non-VR) through classic point and click style play
◮ Intuitive interaction both in VR as well as touch (non-VR)
◮ Google Cardboard compatible
◮ Also works on Android devices without a gyroscope

Book your spot in Egyptian history and discover what the historic dead have left for the afterlife. Unravel complex puzzles as you explore tombs never known to mankind. Clear the air from doubt as you reveal the secrets that the great Pharaohs took to their graves.

If you like adventure games then you'll have an absolute treat awaiting for your with the VR game as it offers traditional adventure like puzzle game-play mixed with the latest virtual reality experience.

Will you unravel the unresolved secrets of the pyramids and reveal history? Start your journey and expand you VR discovery today by downloading this free VR game and find out.
